Depending on your mood lol.  At the time, it was a 4 star simply that being on the road for almost 2 weeks with no Asian food (on purpose), so really needed this from the motherland--knowing the staff is totally non-Chinese lol.  But it's better than average at best compared to Vancouver.  Noodles didn't have the right texture or saucy enough.  Nice to see it's cooked right in front of you.  The fried onions were the highlight lolValue is good if not adding all the extras like I did as per pic.  This is almost $15 Canadian ;( And still cool to eat out of an easy to hold box container lolLocated right at entrance of market so don't sit on the outside like I did, a few panhandlers who didn't have a problem standing right beside you.  Business-wise, this is a great concept, in & out with lower overhead.
